snippet.title: Choose for ME - Project Trailer
snippet.description:
Add to Steam wishlist now:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1185230/Choose_for_ME/

A Puzzle Drama game that will take you on a journey in the Mads Ever mind, between visual suggestions and emotional moments.
Project trailer made by uut Games indie game studio.
--------------------------------
Un Puzzle Drama che vi porterà a fare un viaggio nella mente di Mads Ever, tra suggestioni visive e momenti emozionanti.
Project trailer creato dallo studio indipendente uut Games.

Find more below:
https://uutgames.com/
https://www.facebook.com/uutgames/
https://www.instagram.com/uutgames/
https://twitter.com/uutgames
https://www.reddit.com/user/uutgames

CREW:
Giovanni Cassone 
- 3D Artist
- Material Designer
- Audio & Video Editor
- Cut Scenes Director

Giuseppe Cuzzola
- Game Developer
- Technical Director
- Level Designer
- Project Manager

Antonino Di Stefano
- Creative Director 
- Screenwriter
- Quality Assurance
- Public Relations Officer

Do you like what we do? 
Buy us a coffee! https://ko-fi.com/uutgames/
